00029   class StaticBuffer {
00030   public:
00031     explicit StaticBuffer(size_t len) :
00032         base(new uint8_t[len]), size(len), own(true) {}
00033 
00034     StaticBuffer(void *data, uint32_t len, bool take_ownership=true) :
00035         base((uint8_t *)data), size(len), own(take_ownership) { }
00036 
00037     StaticBuffer() : base(0), size(0), own(true) { }
00038 
00039     StaticBuffer(DynamicBuffer &dbuf) {
00040       base = dbuf.base;
00041       size = dbuf.fill();
00042       own = dbuf.own;
00043       if (own) {
00044         dbuf.base = dbuf.ptr = 0;
00045         dbuf.size = 0;
00046       }
00047     }
00048 
00049     ~StaticBuffer() {
00050       if (own)
00051         delete [] base;
00052     }
00053 
00064     StaticBuffer(StaticBuffer& other) {
00065       base = other.base;
00066       size = other.size;
00067       own = other.own;
00068       if (own) {
00069         other.own = false;
00070         other.base = 0;
00071       }
00072     }
00073 
00084     StaticBuffer &operator=(StaticBuffer &other) {
00085       base = other.base;
00086       size = other.size;
00087       own = other.own;
00088       if (own) {
00089         other.own = false;
00090         other.base = 0;
00091       }
00092       return *this;
00093     }
00094 
00098     StaticBuffer &operator=(DynamicBuffer &dbuf) {
00099       base = dbuf.base;
00100       size = dbuf.fill();
00101       own = dbuf.own;
00102       if (own) {
00103         dbuf.base = dbuf.ptr = 0;
00104         dbuf.size = 0;
00105       }
00106       return *this;
00107     }
00108 
00109     void set(uint8_t *data, uint32_t len, bool take_ownership=true) {
00110       if (own)
00111         delete [] base;
00112       base = data;
00113       size = len;
00114       own = take_ownership;
00115     }
00116 
00117     void free() {
00118       if (own)
00119         delete [] base;
00120       base = 0;
00121       size = 0;
00122     }
00123 
00124     uint8_t *base;
00125     uint32_t size;
00126     bool own;
00127   };

00132   inline bool operator<(const StaticBuffer& sb1, const StaticBuffer& sb2)
00133   {
00134     size_t len = (sb1.size < sb2.size) ? sb1.size : sb2.size;
00135     int cmp = memcmp(sb1.base, sb2.base, len);
00136     return (cmp==0) ? sb1.size < sb2.size : cmp < 0;
00137   }
00138 
00142   inline bool operator==(const StaticBuffer& sb1, const StaticBuffer& sb2)
00143   {
00144     if (sb1.size != sb2.size)
00145       return false;
00146     size_t len = (sb1.size < sb2.size) ? sb1.size : sb2.size;
00147     int equal = memcmp(sb1.base, sb2.base, len);
00148     if (equal == 0 )
00149       return true;
00150     return false;
00151   }
00152 
00156   inline bool operator!=(const StaticBuffer& sb1, const StaticBuffer& sb2)
00157   {
00158     return !(sb1 == sb2);
00159   }

00161   struct LtStaticBuffer {
00162     bool operator()(const StaticBuffer& sb1, const StaticBuffer& sb2) const
00163     {
